attributes.action: Stop the Bin collections going to 3 weekly instead of every 2 weeks.
attributes.additional_details:
Our councils are notifying is that bin collections are changing from every 2 weeks to every 3, it's already a strain so what are the councils thinking? 
Let's try to stop this happening
attributes.background: We are already over run with street litter making our towns look untidy, in some areas vermin rule the streets and hygiene is a concern due to over spilling bins.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Waste collection is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
